name: Guns and Spurs Remastered
description:
Become a lonely cowboy in the wild west, thirsty to take revenge for the death of his wife.

Travel from town to town and take down your enemies in 10 "Wanted" missions.
Ride your horse and run through 10 challenging horse race events around the map.

Stylish 3d graphics with a third person perspective create a great and colorful atmosphere.

A variety of powerful weapons is available to be unlocked, including dual wield pistols and dynamites.

Defeat every boss in 'Wanted' missions and battle them in quick-draw challenges.

Guns and Spurs Remastered features improved graphics with high quality post processing effects including:

  • Ambient Occlusion
  • Anti-aliasing
  • Bloom
  • Color Grading
  • High Quality Real-Time Shadows
  • HD Textures

Updated controls supporting keyboard + joystick.

Run with your horse in an open world full of action!

You can enter buildings such as saloons, gun shops, church and more. Also, you can buy new safe-houses all over the map and change your character's outfits.

Guns and Spurs Remastered offers the freedom to explore the old west in any way possible whether you like to enjoy a ride with your horse or by taking down enemies that will stand in your way the choice is yours.
